Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and Ravindra Jadeja remained the top scorers for the Indian team with 35 runs each
Hardik Pandya proved to be the difference with his unbeaten 33 runs off 17 balls at the end, guiding team India to a 5-wicket win in the last over
Pre-Game Insights: Experts expected India to win this contest against Hong Kong and cement their place in the Super Four stage of the Asia Cup 2022
These two teams will be facing off against each other in T20I for the first time
India has defeated Hong Kong twice in ODIs
Miscellaneous Highlights: India would be hoping for KL Rahul, who was out for a golden duck against Pakistan, to get back his form against a relatively weaker opponent
For Hong Kong, captain Nizakat Khan has been the top scorer for his team in T20Is this year, scoring 249 runs in 8 innings with three fifties to his name
Others: The match will be played at Dubai International Cricket Stadium on Wednesday (31st August)
The Indian bowlers impressed one and all with their performance against Pakistan, especially Bhuvneshwar Kumar & Hardik Pandya
